channel.title: OsRs Private Server
channel.description: So, the Oldschool Runescape is starting to look like a custom private server to me. I just wanted to know if anyone would play something like the osrs today as a private server.

item.title: OsRs Private Server
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

The best vanilla OSRS would have been 2009-2010-ish where it had ok “HD” graphics and was fun and playable with lots of content!

Read full topic

item.title: OsRs Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I have lost the nostalgia factor of osrs, so no I wouldn’t play that. I’d rather see someone do a good 7## remake and then add GOOD custom content after regular content has been almost completed.

Read full topic

item.title: OsRs Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:7, topic:548450”][quote author=Limits link=topic=667358.msg4463127#msg4463127 date=1418614131]

Why anyone would invest time into something non-official is beyond me

What would be non-official?

Really?.. Anything that isn’t the actual thing basically.

I didn’t think he was referring to the actual Oldschool RuneScape.

Oh okay It’s fine
[/quote]
Would you play an osrs private server?[/quote]
I don’t really like RuneScape anymore.

Read full topic
